name: SFSpeechRecognitionRequest
desc: An abstract class that represents a request to recognize speech from an audio source.

items.name: var requiresOnDeviceRecognition: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether a request must keep its audio data on the device.

items.name: var shouldReportPartialResults: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you want intermediate results returned for each utterance.

items.name: var contextualStrings: [String]
items.desc: An array of phrases that should be recognized, even if they are not in the system vocabulary.

items.name: var taskHint: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint
items.desc: A value that indicates the type of speech recognition being performed.

items.name: enum SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint
items.desc: The type of task for which you are using speech recognition.
